cookingTips: Soak dried beans overnight to reduce cooking time and improve digestibility
Cook bacon until crispy, render fat, then use for sautéing serrano peppers
Simmer beans gently for 1-2 hours until tender, adding serrano peppers in final 30 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you balance the heat from serrano peppers with the richness of bacon throughout the cooking process?
